#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
	int t, m, n, k, i, j;
	int arr[1023][1023];
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d%d", &m, &n, &k);
		m++;
		n++;
		arr[0][1] = 1;
		for(i = 1; i <= m; i++)
			for(j = 1; j <= n; j++)
				arr[i][j] = (arr[i][j-1] + arr[i-1][j]) % k;
		printf("%d\n", arr[m][n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
